page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: THERE ARE LOTS OF BUILDINGS IN NARBERTH BUT, YOU NEED A HOUSE TO LIVE IN- HOUSES COME IN MANY SHAPES AND SIZES.BUNGLOW, DETACHED, COUNCIL HOUSE, SEMI DETACHED OR COTTAGE AND IF PEOPLE ARE ON HOLIDAY THEY CAN STAY IN A CARAVAN.MOST OF THE FLATS IN NARBERTH ARE ABOVE THE SHOPS IN HIGH STREET.NARBERTH CASTLE HAS BEEN LIVED IN LIKE A HOUSE, NOW THERE ARE ONLY REWINS. BLACK ALDERN IS A BEAUTIFUL OLD HOUSE. BLOOMFIELD IS A COMMUNITY CENTRE THAT ALSO USED TO BE A MANSION. ALONG TIME AGO THEY USED MORTAR TO BUILD THINGS LIKE CASTLES. NOW WE HAVE LOVELY MODERN HOUSES WITH CHIPPINGS, OR SOME PAINTED ON THE OUTSIDE SOME PEOPLE HAVE GARAGES ATTACHED TO THEIR HOMES MOST HOUSES ARE IN STREETS IN THE TOWNS AND HAVE GOT A NUMBER OR A NAME ON THE FRONT OF THE HOUSE.
